title: A Different Orc (Part 1)
body:
A Different Orc (Part 1)

Evan moved deeper into the orc den. It is been one hour since he entered the orc den.

During this time he encountered many orcs.

Most of these orcs were just D and D+ rank. There were occasionally one or two C rank orcs, but he did not get any C rank core after killing them.

In this one hour, he collected a total of nine cores. Five of these cores were D+ rank while four were D rank.

Evan absorbed all the D+ rank cores, but he didn't absorb the D rank cores.

He absorbed one D rank core earlier, but he found his monarch core barely progressed after absorbing it.

For some reason, he felt his monarch core didn't absorb the energy of the D rank core, and that energy disappeared somewhere.

It was the same thing that happened when he tried to absorb F rank cores in the past to get skills.

At that time when he absorbed those F rank cores, he felt their energy also disappeared somewhere and his monarch core did not absorb it.
